item.title: About
item.description: Thank you for your visit my website. I am a software engineer and usually work at an company. After work, I also create some games, services and OSS. I have been posting articles about technology and so on. If you are interested my posts, please visit it.(I’m sorry but I write in Japanese) Experience Programming language is tool.
